conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway with clear wall geometry and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D fundamentals; walls have consistent height and clear thickness.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout; room proportions and adjacencies are exact. Minor simplification of window frames.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D floor plan perfectly in every room, including bathroom fixtures and kitchen counters.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting; score slightly reduced only for minor aliasing on thin stair elements.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D conversion that perfectly mirrors the source floor plan's layout and furniture arrangement.
